entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Shaunavon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:56 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Fog. Low minus 20 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 9 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Fog dissipating. High minus 4 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4 except plus 5 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
